name: Material Text Field / Input
description:
2,240 Input Variants

Need I say more?


In this file, find all three Material Design input styles — Standard, Outlined, and Filled — ready for your customization and use in the next big app.


FEATURING

Preserve Label Text

Quickly change states with all of your text and colors preserved.


Auto Layout

Inputs resize according to their content.


Fixed Width

Inputs stay fixed at the width you choose.


3 Styles

Standard, Outlined, and Filled


8 Properties

Width, State, Has Value, Assistive Text, Start & End Adornments, Required Field, and Size


5 States

Inactive, Hover, Focused, Error, Disabled


----------------


Coming Soon

Multi-line inputs

Multi-select inputs


And I will be publishing more Material Design components as I go — Chips, Snackbars, Tabs, Buttons, Radio Buttons, Checkboxes, oh my!
